name: Mecanim To Ragdoll Locomotion Test
description:
Control :

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

C - Crouch

Ctrl - Steady Stance

Release the sprint button then immediately pressing jump for roll jump

Release the sprint button then immediately pressing ctrl for sliding

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I tried using free assets from unity marketplace called "BsRagdoll"

Basically the script allow your character to turn into ragdoll and then mecanim again

I modified a little bit the script, so it can turned into ragdoll based on character impact speed with the objects or the terrain surface
